body.p: This is available in the tab General configuration.

ul.li: SSL only for agent : activate or not communication only in HTTPS between plugin and agents.
Inventory frequency (in hours) : parameter for the PROLOG function of agent. With it, agent must contact plugin always between 0 and xx hours (configured here).
Delete tasks after : Delete tasks xx hours after they are finished.
Agent port : it's the port of agent to wake it from the plugin. (by default, port is 62354).
